Adds an entirely new faction with over a.message: Adds an entirely new faction with over a hundred units for use in skirmish and multiplayer. Not compatible with mods which add additional units. If you don't like the new theme it can be disabled in Settings. Cannot be used in Galactic War.

Advanced Anti-Air Turret - Fires homing.message: Advanced Anti-Air Turret - Fires homing rockets which deal splash damage. Only attacks air targets.

Advanced Anti-Air Walker - High damage p.message: Advanced Anti-Air Walker - High damage precision laser strikes. Only attacks air targets.

Advanced Artillery - Very accurate. High.message: Advanced Artillery - Very accurate. High splash damage. Attacks land, sea and seabed targets.

Advanced Builder - Builds basic and advanced structures. Builds vehicle titan. Durable. More powerful than other land and air builders.

Advanced Builder - Builds orbital struct.message: Advanced Builder - Builds orbital structures. Builds all titans.
